entry.title: Other Writing Around the Web
entry.content:
I haven't spent much time writing content for this blog, but I have been doing some writing on other sites. Here are some of my posts from other sites:

  • 4 Techniques for Developing for both iOS and Android Discusses the pros and cons of web apps vs. native apps vs. cross compiling tools such as Titanium
  • The Value in Launching Early Why pushing your launch date up by cutting features is only going to make you more money.
  • Why We Don't Bill Hourly An explination of my logic behind changing my billing techniques in 2014. Protip: Start billing weekly.
  • Pirate Metrics, 5 Numbers you Need to Know About Your Business. Writing about the main metrics companies should be looking at.
  • How Letting Go of Money Made me More of It One of my personal favorites. Discussing how life lessons from being a profressional online poker player translate into being a consultant.
